entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
